title: Refactoring
author: Martin Fowler
description: Improving the Design of Existing Code. This book is a must-have for anyone serious about code quality.

title: Eloquent JavaScript
author: Marijn Haverbeke
description: A Modern Introduction to Programming. Deeply practical and very readable.

title: Soft Skills
author: John Sonmez
description: The software developer's life manual. It covers everything from fitness to finance.

title: Code Complete
author: Steve McConnell
description: A Practical Handbook of Software Construction. Widely considered one of the best practical guides to programming.

title: Head First Design Patterns
author: Eric Freeman
description: A Brain-Friendly Guide. Learn how to create reusable, maintainable software with patterns.

title: The Impact of Technology on Modern Education
author: Abdul Wahab
description: The Impact of Technology on Modern Education: Transforming Classrooms and Learning in the Digital Age explores how technology is reshaping the way we teach, learn, and interact within educational environments. From digital classrooms and e-learning platforms to AI-driven tools and virtual collaboration, this book highlights the innovations driving modern education. It offers insights into the benefits, challenges, and future possibilities of integrating technology in schools, colleges, and universities, empowering educators and learners to adapt, innovate, and thrive in the digital era.
